Hello! My name is Allison Day and I love data! I recently got my Bachelor's at Brigham Young University - Idaho studying Data Science. I am also an Associate Consultant/Associate Data Scientist at the Human Capital Management Institute. I am passionate about [data visualization](https://www.tableau.com/) and [data engineering](https://www.snowflake.com/). I am also a huge fan of [Streamlit](https://streamlit.io/).<!-- I am currently learning [](). -->  I am excited to share my journey with you!
